purpleculture_pinyin:
lǜ
to strain; to filter
напрягаться; фильтровать
rtega_mnemonic:
濾濾RS㴓沪滤濾𤄦filter
  • be concerned 慮 about the quality of the water 氵: filter it

(Simplified: 滤)
Pictophonetic: 慮 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 慮 [ lǜ ] anxious, concerned, worried
heisig_chinese_memo: The filter exercises prudence on the water, only letting the good water pass.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: applying consideration (慮) to the water (氵) = filtration
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Water filters always make me ponder about how they work.
humanum_full_description_en: From the sound of " water " and " care ", it means removing impurities to make it more pure. Jia Sixie of the Northern Wei Dynasty "Qi Min Yao Shu‧ Planting Red and Blue Flowers and Gardenias": "Receive white juice, filter in silk bags, and put it in the urn." Tang Bai Juyi "Send Wen Chang Shangren East Tour": "Mountain Susun River" Tiger, river water filter bug."
humanum_short_description_en: The sound of " water " and " care " means removing impurities to make it more pure.
humanum_full_description: 從「水」，「慮」聲，表示去除雜質使之更純淨。北魏賈思勰《齊民要術‧種紅藍花及梔子》：「接取白汁，絹袋濾，著別瓮中。」唐白居易〈送文暢上人東游〉：「山宿馴溪虎，江行濾水蟲。」
humanum_short_description: 從「水」，「慮」聲，表示去除雜質使之更純淨。

Chinese: The filter exercises prudence on the water, only letting the good water pass.
Meaning: filter
Hanzi: 滤
Story: Water filters always make me ponder about how they work.
Kind: traditional
從「 水 」，「 慮 」聲，表示去除雜質使之更純淨。北魏賈思勰《齊民要術‧種紅藍花及梔子》：「接取白汁，絹袋濾，著別瓮中。」唐白居易〈送文暢上人東游〉：「山宿馴溪虎，江行濾水蟲。」
From the sound of " water" and " care", it means removing impurities to make it more pure. Jia Sixie of the Northern Wei Dynasty "Qi Min Yao Shu‧ Planting Red and Blue Flowers and Gardenias": "Receive white juice, filter in silk bags, and put it in the urn." Tang Bai Juyi "Send Wen Chang Shangren East Tour": "Mountain Susun River" Tiger, river water filter bug."

濾字的基本解释

濾
lǜ
见“滤”。

濾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bù］
［《廣韻》分勿切，入物，非。］
(1)无，没有。
(2)非，不是。
(3)不到，未。
(4)副词。表否定。
(5)副词。表禁止。勿，不要。
(6)副词。单用，做否定性的回答。
(7)副词。方言。用在句末表示疑问，跟反复问句的作用相等。
(8)副词。用在动补结构中间，表示不可能达到某种结果。
(9)副词。“不”字的前后叠用相同的名词，表示不在乎或不相干。
(10)副词。跟“便”“就”搭用，表示选择。
(11)副词。方言。不用；不要（限用于某些套语）。
(12)助词。无义。用以足句或加强语气。
(13)助词。无义。表示反问语气。
(14)通“丕”。大。
[②]［fǒu］
［《廣韻》方久切，上有，非。］
同“否1”。
[③]［fōu］
［《廣韻》甫鳩切，平尤，非。］
姓。汉有不疑。见《後汉书·皇甫规传》。
[④]［fū］
［《集韻》風無切，平虞，非。］
花蒂。
[⑤]［pǐ］
［《韻补》補美切，上紙］
通“否2”。<

filter
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bù］
["Guangyun" is divided into do not cut, into things, not. ]
(1) No, no.
(2) No, no.
(3) No, no.
(4) Adverbs. Table negation.
(5) Adverbs. Table prohibited. Don't, don't.
(6) Adverbs. Use it alone to make a negative answer.
(7) Adverbs. dialect. Used at the end of a sentence to express a question, it is equivalent to a repeated question.
(8) Adverbs. Used in the middle of the dynamic compensation structure, it means that it is impossible to achieve a certain result.
(9) Adverbs. The same nouns are used before and after the word "bu", which means that they don't care or are irrelevant.
(10) Adverbs. Used with "convenience" and "just" to indicate choice.
(11) Adverbs. dialect. No; don't (limited to certain phrases).
(12) Particles. Meaningless. Use full sentences or to strengthen the tone.
(13) Particles. Meaningless. Indicates a rhetorical tone.
(14) Link "Pi". Big.
[②]［fǒu］
["Guangyun" Fang Jiu cut, there is no. ]
Same as "No 1".
[③] [fōu]
["Guangyun" Fu Jiuqie, Pingyou, Fei. ]
name. Han has no doubts. See "Book of the Later Han·Huangfu Rules Biography".
[④]［fū］
["Jiyun" wind is not cut, Pingyu, non. ]
Flower pedicle.
[⑤] [pǐ]
["Yunbu" to make up the beauty and cut, put on paper]
Pass "No 2".
